question: Hydrochloric acid is considered a strong acid. This is because_____
options: It has a low pH value, which is approximately 4.
It has pH value that is greater than 7
It is made up of noble elements
correctAnswer: It has a low pH value, which is approximately 4.

question: Why will you not get harmed from touching a lemon battery?
options: The Voltage of lemon batteries is too high
The Voltage of lemon batteries is too weak
correctAnswer: The Voltage of lemon batteries is too weak

question: In lemon battery, the lemon juice is used as which component?.
Why are aluminium and copper strips used instead of plastic/wooden strips
options: They are good conductors of electricity.

correctAnswer: They are good conductors of electricity.
